The facilities/check_empty.hpp header defines a variadic macro for the C++20 level that checks if its data is empty or not.

Usage

#include <boost/preprocessor/facilities/check_empty.hpp>

Contents

  • BOOST_PP_CHECK_EMPTY (v)
